Frequently Asked Questions

  • Q1. How do I apply?

    Please click here to apply

  • Q2. What is the admission procedure?

    Admission is based on satisfying the minimum requirements for both the domains. There will a telephonic interview, followed by an aptitude test. The decision of the CTM Team and the programme directors will be final. There may be pre-requisites for a few courses, which the candidate should be willing to master, if not already familiar

  • Q3. Is there any age limit for applying for this programme?

    This programme is recommended for individuals above 22 years and below 50 years of age.

  • Q4. Should I pay the fees in one go?

    The Programme fee may be paid in multiple instalments.

  • Q5. How will the course be delivered - completely online or blended?

    The course will predominantly be delivered online. The webinars and discussion forums will help you interact with your instructor more frequently and actively. Multiple campus connect sessions held during the modules will allow you to interact with your instructors and peers face-to-face.

  • Q6. Do I need to take the courses in sequence?

    The courses will run as per a fixed schedule.

  • Q7. Who will the certificate be provided by?

    The certificate will be jointly provided by IIMB and IITM.

  • Q8. Is there an eligibility criterion?

    The eligibility criteria is as follows:

    • An undergraduate degree in any stream.
    • At least 2 years of work experience.
    • While a technical degree is not mandatory, it will be an added advantage
  • Q9. What is the maximum duration within which the programme can be completed?

    The regular programme duration is 11 months. However, the registration is valid upto 2 years

  • Q10. Is there any scholarship?

    Limited financial assistance will be provided upon request to deserving candidates.

  • Q11. What infrastructure/ facility is needed in order to take this programme?

    You will require a computer and a good Internet connection.

  • Q12. How do I track my application?

    Once you have submitted your application form, you can write to our student support mail id (ctm-admissions@iimbx.edu.in) to know the status of your submission.

  • Q13. Do I need to hold a CAT, JEE or a similar exam rank?

    No. This is not required.

  • Q14. May I defer my admission?

    Your admission will be deferred only if such a request is raised at least 10 days prior to the start of the programme. This also allows for a refund. Cancellations during the run of the programme will not be refunded.

  • Q15. On successful completion of the course, will learners become a part of IITM/IIMB Alumni?

    No.
